column1: Reminder emails may promote a shopping cart price rule with or without coupon. If a shopping cart price rule defines an auto-generated coupon, this reminder rule will generate a random coupon code for each customer.
column2: Reminder emails may promote a shopping cart price rule with or without coupon. If a shopping cart price rule defines an auto-generated coupon, this reminder rule will generate a random coupon code for each customer.
